trends: There has been one other sighting in Mineola
There were no other sightings in Mineola on or around January 31st 2000
Summary: Dark object flying to the s/w towords JFK airport.
divs: sighting detailswhile in the back yard in the hopes of seeing a meteor shower i saw an objectthat looked identicle to a group, 6-9, of black helium balloons, strungtogether, and moving quickly acroos the sky. the only difference is instead ofthe balloons being vertical, one atop the other, as would be expected of heliumballoons - they were, and remained, in a fixed horizontal position as it movedto the s\w from the n\e, towards jfk intl airport. no wobble, no sound, nolights. exactly like balloos but too perfectly a horizontal position26 flight. balloons would have been rising26 the wind was calm which is why the speed26 horizontal travel was odd. unfortunately i have only estimated the month - ido not recall which meteor shower i hoped to see. may have been leonids, notsure.
